alert.note: Alert for Boone; Hamilton; Webster (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 12:16AM CDT until August 02 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Webster County in central Iowa... Northeastern Boone County in central Iowa... Southwestern Hamilton County in central Iowa... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1216 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles southwest of Webster City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jewell Junction, Dayton, Stratford, Otho, Stanhope, Lehigh, Brushy Creek St Recreation Area and Dolliver Memorial State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
